title: Contact DaShan Metal - Global Custom Fabrication
description: Reach out to Dongguan DaShan Metal for custom metal spinning, stretching, and precision fabrication services. Submit your designs and partner with us globally!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Custom Metal Fabrication, Welcome to Visit Our Factory and Discuss Cooperation
contact.address: Room 101, No. 12 Banhu East Street, Huangjiang Town, Dongguan, Guangdong, China
contact.description: Dongguan Huangjiang Dashan Metal Fabrication Factory specializes in high-precision metal spinning and stretching, serving global clients with custom metal processing solutions tailored to your needs.
contact.inquiry: Reach out via email, phone, or WeChat for inquiries. Our team responds within 24 hours to discuss your project requirements.
